attributes.action: Prohibit Amazon Reviewers From Using Fake Names As Part Of The Government's Anti-Trolling Campaign
attributes.additional_details: Now that Amazon is the leading retailer for the entertainments industry, they should be prohibited from allowing reviewers to post harmful reviews of our work by way of pseudonyms. If real names only are permitted, such reviews which frequently have little or nothing to do with the product on sale will be brought under control. Such reviews, headed by spiteful titles, are damaging to our livelihood, and also damaging to the retailer, and are therefore counterproductive.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Amazon.
